# Recursion
### Factorial Calculator:
Factorial Inputs:   
```java
for(int counter = 0; counter <=21; counter ++) {
	System.out.printf("%d! = %d%n", counter, factorial(counter));
}
```
Facotorial Outputs
```java
0! = 1
1! = 1
2! = 2
3! = 6
4! = 24
5! = 120
6! = 720
7! = 5040
8! = 40320
9! = 362880
10! = 3628800
11! = 39916800
12! = 479001600		<-- cause overflow for int variables
13! = 6227020800
14! = 87178291200
15! = 1307674368000
16! = 20922789888000
17! = 355687428096000
18! = 6402373705728000
19! = 121645100408832000
20! = 2432902008176640000
21! = -4249290049419214848		<-- cause overflow for long variables
```

---

### Factorial Calculator with BigInteger:
Factorial Inputs:   
```java
for(int counter=0; counter<=50; counter++) {
	System.out.printf("%d! = %d%n", counter, factorial(BigInteger.valueOf(counter)));
}
```
Facotorial Outputs
```java
0! = 1
1! = 1
2! = 2
3! = 6
4! = 24
5! = 120
6! = 720
7! = 5040
8! = 40320
9! = 362880
10! = 3628800
11! = 39916800
12! = 479001600
13! = 6227020800
14! = 87178291200
15! = 1307674368000
16! = 20922789888000
17! = 355687428096000
18! = 6402373705728000
19! = 121645100408832000
20! = 2432902008176640000
21! = 51090942171709440000
22! = 1124000727777607680000
.
.
.
48! = 12413915592536072670862289047373375038521486354677760000000000
49! = 608281864034267560872252163321295376887552831379210240000000000
50! = 30414093201713378043612608166064768844377641568960512000000000000
```
